Text.Value: Not now. Someone's been messing with my bloody cooking pot.
Stop thinking about delicious dwarf and take the bowl.
Take a bowl.
We'll need every bit of strength to make it to Baldur's Gate. Trust me.

EditorData.NodeContext: Thinks the player is being a spoilt idiot.Sounds very annoyed now.

Text.Value: If a gnoll catches your scent, you'll need every bit of strength. Trust me.
Ha! That's a good attitude.

EditorData.NodeContext: Almost a laugh at the player's enthusiasm for your food. You really appreciate the compliment.

Text.Value: Here. Have more. We'll need every bit of strength to make it to Baldur's Gate. Trust me.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Scoops out another bowl of gruel and hands it to the player.
EditorData.NodeContext: This is the warmest you've sounded in this dialog. You want the player to make the journey in one piece, and giving them more food is how you show it.

Text.Value: See how you feel when your pack is empty - it'll be this or a handful of weeds.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Okta] holds a [Stew Bowl] in her hands. <Felix>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shrug as Okta pulls the bowl back towards herself.
EditorData.NodeContext: Player has rudely turned down your food. You're annoyed and offended.

Text.Value: You've had your share. Leave some for the rest.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shrug, as if everything is fine.
EditorData.NodeContext: You're trying to keep the worry out of your voice and make it sound like everything is under control.

Text.Value: Hm. Look in your eyes says otherwise.

EditorData.NodeContext: Player has made light of their difficult upbringing. You have a moment of sadness at the thought of what they must have gone through, but don't want to push it.

Text.Value: It's all in the past.
Fancy a bowl?

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Okta] holds a [Stew Bowl] in her hands. <Felix>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Holds the bowl out to the player. Nods towards it, doesn't expect to be refused.
EditorData.NodeContext: Gruff as you hand the food to the player. Doesn't expect the player to refuse.

Text.Value: No, thank you. The smell is more than enough.
You been on hard times too, huh?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Eye widen slightly in surprise, gruff exterior softens.
EditorData.NodeContext: Player has mentioned a difficult upbringing. Moment of surprise and connection as you realise this person may be in the same situation as you.

Text.Value: Ha! You're a far cry from such things. But if I fooled your nose, I must be doing something right.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Okta] holds a [Stew Bowl] in her hands. <Felix>
EditorData.NodeContext: Player has guessed that your dish is far more complicated than it is. You're happy and warmed by the compliment.

Text.Value: Agreed. Hungry warriors make for easy prey.
No worse than what you're facing now.
Suit yourself, but the only way we'll make it to Baldur's Gate is to run, and run hard.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Okta] holds a [Stew Bowl] in her hands. <Felix>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shrug as Okta pulls the bowl back towards her.
EditorData.NodeContext: Player has turned down your food. You're annoyed but hiding it with indifference.

Text.Value: Best to fill your belly now - while we still can.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Okta] holds a [Stew Bowl] in her hands. <Felix>
EditorData.NodeContext: Warmth to her voice despite the gruff exterior. She's obviously concerned about the player but is hiding it.

Text.Value: I'm not hungry.
I never turn down a free meal.
Look. It ain't much, but it might make all the difference.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shrugs as she gestures to the food.
EditorData.NodeContext: Player has taken food and asked what it is. You're a bit embarassed at the paltry offering, but aware that this is as good as it gets and that you all need your strength.

Text.Value: The only way we'll make it to Baldur's Gate is to run, and run hard.

EditorData.NodeContext: Knows that there's every chance everyone will die on the journey. Trying to stress how dangerous it is without scaring the player.

Text.Value: You're an easy one to please, aren't you?
Grey goo... I think I ate things like this in the past. When I was desperate.
A bowl of grey goo. Reminds me of home.
This is a delicacy of your land? I'll try anything once.
We'll be leaving soon. Make sure you stock up.

EditorData.NodeContext: A gruff sounding chiding that comes from a place of concern.

Text.Value: You. Saw you fighting those slimy bastards.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Okta] holds a [Stew Bowl] in her hands. <Felix>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Bowl in hand, paused mid preperation of gruel. Next to a pot with a ladle in hand. Looking at the player, appears annoyed.
EditorData.NodeContext: Gruff sounding. Shouldn't be clear if you're annoyed at the player or not.

Text.Value: Didn't think the food was that bad.
Take the bowl.
I'm good, thanks.
Thank you. What's in this? Oats? Honey?
This slop is beneath me.
Go ahead. Turn that pretty nose of yours up.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Okta] holds a [Stew Bowl] in her hands. <Felix>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shrug as Okta pulls the bowl back towards her.
EditorData.NodeContext: Player has turned down food in a condescending way. You're a little annoyed but mainly think the player is being an idiot.

Text.Value: That doesn't mean it's behind us though, does it?

EditorData.NodeContext: Player has made light of their difficult upbringing. You have a moment of sadness at the thought of what they must have gone through, but don't want to push it.

Text.Value: Food. You want it or not?

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Okta] holds a [Stew Bowl] in her hands. <Felix>
EditorData.NodeContext: Player has asked what it is. You're getting annoyed.

Text.Value: What is it, exactly?
I much prefer roasted dwarf.

Synopsis: An older woman, responsible for feeding an entire camp of refugees before they leave. She is gruff but has a heart of gold. She offers the player some gruel. Purpose is to highlight how desperate their situation is.
